activities: Accelero Health Partners, LLC is a results-driven consulting company specializing in the design and implementation of musculoskeletal programs that create sustainable competitive advantages for hospitals and physicians.  In connection with its business activities,it collects and processes personal information pertaining to residents of the European Union and Switzerland for purposes of human resources administration, innovation and research, manufacturing and processing orders from customers and suppliers, marketing, compliance, and related business purposes, corporate transactions and other legal and business activities.
contacttitle1: Compliance Officer and Senior Healthcare Counsel, Americas
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resource, clinical research participant, patient, customer, supplier and other business partner personal data in all formats, including electronic and off-line
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
